attributes.action: Close Fast Food Delivery Services, to stop the spread of the Corona Virus
attributes.additional_details: Close all fast food delivery services to ensure that all people are safe during this national emergency.
attributes.background: To stop fast food companies many a profit before thinking about the workforces safety.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/307294.
